oc get is
oc get secrets
oc get cm
oc get users

oc get clusterrolebindings
oc get endpoints
oc get builds
oc get apiservices

oc get all -A
rosa list clusters
rosa list nodepools
az aro list
velero backup get

oc describe pv <pv>
oc describe pvc <pvc>
oc describe sc <storageclass>
oc describe pod <pod>
oc describe svc <svc>
oc describe dc <deploymentConfig>
oc describe node <node>
oc describe quota
oc describe co <name>
oc describe clusterversion
oc describe csv <csv-name> -n <ns>
oc describe subscription <sub-name> -n <ns>
oc describe rolebinding <rb> -n <ns>
oc describe route <route> -n <ns>

oc create -f pvc.yaml
oc create -f storageclass.yaml
oc create configmap <name> --from-file=...
oc create secret generic <name> --from-literal=key=value
oc create serviceaccount <sa> -n <ns>
oc create role <role>
oc create clusterrole <role>
oc create clusterrolebinding <binding>
oc create -f operatorgroup.yaml
oc create -f subscription.yaml
oc create route edge <name> --service=<svc>
oc create user <name>
oc create -f custom-resource.yaml
oc create new-build --name=<name> <git-repo>
rosa create cluster --cluster-name <name>
rosa create nodepool -c <cluster> --replicas=3
az aro create --resource-group <rg> --name <cluster>
velero backup create <name>
velero restore create --from-backup <backup>

oc apply -f pvc.yaml
oc apply -f storageclass.yaml
oc apply -f operatorgroup.yaml
oc apply -f subscription.yaml
oc apply -f custom-resource.yaml
oc apply -k <kustomize-dir>
oc apply -f <manifest-dir>
oc process -f template.yaml -p PARAM=value | oc apply -f -

oc delete pvc <name>
oc delete -f pvc.yaml
oc delete project <name>
oc delete pod <pod>
oc delete clusterrole <role>
oc delete route <route>
rosa delete cluster -c <name>
az aro delete -n <cluster> -g <rg>

oc auth can-i list
oc auth can-i get pods -n <ns>
oc auth can-i <verb> <resource> -n <ns>
oc auth whoami

oc login https://api.cluster:6443
oc login -u <user> -p <pass>
oc login --token=<token> --server=<api-url>
rosa login
az login
awx login

oc logs <pod>
oc logs -f <pod>
oc logs <pod> -c <container>
oc logs -f bc/<buildconfig>
oc logs deployment/<operator> -n <ns>
rosa logs (diagnostics)
velero logs <backup>

oc exec <pod> -- ls
oc exec -it <pod> -- bash
oc exec -n openshift-monitoring <pod> -- curl localhost

oc scale deploy <name> --replicas=3
oc scale dc <name> --replicas=2
rosa create nodepool --replicas=<n>

oc rollout status deploy/<name>
oc rollout history deploy/<name>
oc rollout undo deploy/<name>

oc expose svc <service>
oc expose pod <pod> --port=8080
oc expose svc/<svc> --hostname=custom.domain

oc patch pvc <name> -p '{"spec":{"resources":{"requests":{"storage":"<size>"}}}}'
oc patch clusterversion version --type=merge -p '{"spec":{"channel":"stable"}}'

oc adm top nodes
oc adm top pods
oc adm policy add-role-to-user <role> <user> -n <ns>
oc adm policy add-cluster-role-to-user <role> <user>
oc adm policy add-scc-to-user <scc> -z <sa>
oc adm policy remove-scc-from-user <scc> <user>
oc adm upgrade
oc adm must-gather
oc adm inspect
oc adm manage-node <node> --schedulable
oc adm cordon <node>
oc adm uncordon <node>
oc adm cluster-info
oc adm node-logs <node>

oc port-forward pod/<pod> 8080:80
oc port-forward svc/<svc> 9090:9090

oc start-build <buildconfig>
oc start-build <bc> --from-dir=.

oc rsync <local-dir> <pod>:/path
oc cp <pod>:/path ./local

oc new-app <image or template>
oc new-build <git repo>
oc tag <image>:<tag> <is-name>:<tag>
oc import-image <image-stream> --confirm

oc api-resources
oc explain pv
oc explain pvc
oc explain deployment

oc debug node/<node>
oc debug pod/<pod>

oc config view
oc config get-contexts
oc config use-context <context>
oc completion bash

velero install --provider <provider> --bucket <bucket>
velero backup create <name>
velero restore create --from-backup <backup>
velero backup get

rosa login
rosa create cluster
rosa list clusters
rosa describe cluster -c <name>

rosa delete cluster
rosa upgrade cluster -c <cluster>

az aro list

az aro delete -n <cluster> -g <rg>

ansible -m ping all
ansible-playbook playbook.yml
ansible-playbook -i inventory playbook.yml --check --diff
